Text: Hi! Great torrent, btw I'm really new at this so, how do I instal this? (I have installed your other torrent :P)

How to install:

1) unzip etc
2) open crack folder and run dmg file
3) install ocula 
4) go to HD/library/application support/nuke/nuke6.3/plugins/3.0/
5) copy and paste the crack replacing everything inside previously mentioned folder.

Hope this helps! :)
